Package BillboardServer

Class Evaluate

java.lang.Object
BillboardServer.Evaluate
public class Evaluate
extends java.lang.Object

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Evaluate()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static java.lang.Object EvaluateCreateEditBillboard​(java.sql.Connection con, Helper.Billboard billboard)
    Takes a db connection and Billboard object as parameters, inserts billboard into database
    static java.lang.Object EvaluateCreateUser​(java.sql.Connection con, Helper.Requests.CreateUserRequest request)
    Takes db connection and Create User Request as parameters - inserts the new user and creates the permissions
    static java.lang.Object EvaluateCurrentBillboard​(java.sql.Connection con)
    Takes a database connection as a parameter - returns either the currently scheduled billboard or the placeholder file
    static java.lang.Object EvaluateDeleteBillboard​(java.sql.Connection con, java.lang.String name)
    Takes a db connection and String billboard name as parameters and deletes the schedules associated with the billboard then deletes the billboard.
    static java.lang.Object EvaluateDeleteUser​(java.sql.Connection con, Helper.Requests.DeleteUserRequest request, java.lang.String requestingUser)
    Takes a db connection, delete user request and requesting user as parameters Updates any existing billboards and schedules that were created by the deleted user and changes the created by field to the deleting user Then deletes user permissions associated with the user and then deletes the user
    static java.lang.Object EvaluateGetBillboard​(java.sql.Connection con, java.lang.String billboardName)
    Takes db connection and billboard name as parameters - returns all billboard information if billboard exists - otherwise error
    static java.lang.Object EvaluateGetPermissions​(java.sql.Connection con, Helper.Requests.GetUserPermissionsRequest request)
    Takes a db connection and get permissions request and returns a list of strings of the users permissions
    static java.lang.Object EvaluateListBillboards​(java.sql.Connection con)
    Takes db connection as parameter - returns a list of names and creators of all billboards in the database
    static java.lang.Object EvaluateListUsers​(java.sql.Connection con)
    Takes a db connection and returns a list of usernames and how many billboards a user has created
    static java.lang.Object EvaluateLogin​(java.sql.Connection con, Helper.Requests.LoginRequest request)
    Takes LoginRequest and db connection as parameters - checks if username and password match a user and if so returns a session token - else returns error
    static java.lang.Object EvaluateRemoveFromSchedule​(java.sql.Connection con, Helper.Requests.RemoveFromScheduleRequest request)
    Takes a db connection and remove schedule request, then deletes from the schedule based on billboard name and schedule time
    static java.lang.Object EvaluateScheduleBillboard​(java.sql.Connection con, Helper.Requests.ScheduleBillboardRequest request, java.lang.String creatorName)
    Takes db connection and schedule properties as parameters - inserts schedule into database
    static java.lang.Object EvaluateSetUserPassword​(java.sql.Connection con, Helper.Requests.SetUserPasswordRequest request)
    Takes a db connection and set password request, then gets the salted hash of the provided password and updates the users details
    static java.lang.Object EvaluateSetUserPermissions​(java.sql.Connection con, Helper.Requests.SetUserPermissionsRequest request)
    Takes a db connection and set user permissions request as parameters Deletes existing permissions then inserts new ones into database
    static java.lang.Object EvaluateViewSchedule​(java.sql.Connection con)
    Takes db connection as parameter, returns all scheduled billboards for the next 7 days

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • EvaluateLogin

      public static java.lang.Object EvaluateLogin​(java.sql.Connection con, Helper.Requests.LoginRequest request)
      Takes LoginRequest and db connection as parameters - checks if username and password match a user and if so returns a session token - else returns error
      Parameters:
      con - Database connection
      request - Login Request object
      Returns:
      Session token if login successful - otherwise return ErrorMessage

      Returns:
      List of billboards if successful, otherwise return ErrorMessage

    • EvaluateGetBillboard

      public static java.lang.Object EvaluateGetBillboard​(java.sql.Connection con, java.lang.String billboardName)

      Parameters:
      con - Database connection
      billboardName - Name of billboard to be retrieved
      Returns:
      Billboard object with billboard contents if successful - otherwise returns ErrorMessage

      Returns:

    • EvaluateDeleteUser

      public static java.lang.Object EvaluateDeleteUser​(java.sql.Connection con, Helper.Requests.DeleteUserRequest request, java.lang.String requestingUser)
      Takes a db connection, delete user request and requesting user as parameters Updates any existing billboards and schedules that were created by the deleted user and changes the created by field to the deleting user Then deletes user permissions associated with the user and then deletes the user
      Parameters:
      con - Database connection
      request - Delete user request to evaluate
      requestingUser - User requesting the deletion
      Returns:
      Returns true if successful - otherwise returns ErrorMessage
